abstract: In a sign of apparent backpedaling by officials here, the Russian government said on Wednesday that it would expedite work permits for the chief executive of a BP joint venture, and five other senior staff members.
lead_paragraph: In a sign of apparent backpedaling by officials here, the Russian government said on Wednesday that it would expedite work permits for the chief executive of a BP joint venture, and five other senior staff members.

headline.main: In Turnabout, Russia to Allow Permits for BP Workers
